docs.snippet: While their friends enjoy the freedom of summertime, these youngsters pound the pavement, carrying the weighty expectations of their parents and communities.

headline.print_headline: Why Attend Summer Camp if Fame May Await?

docs.abstract: Aspiring child models travel to New York along with their parents for auditions and shot at fame, forgoing typical summer vacation.

docs.snippet: The nationwide suspension of the messaging service ended a day after a lower court judge ordered it in a quest for information in a criminal case.

headline.main: Brazilian Judge Lifts Suspension of WhatsApp

docs.abstract: Brazilian judge lifts nationwide suspension of WhatsApp messaging service, which was blocked after Facebook-owned service did not comply with requests for data related to organized crime and drug trafficking case.

docs.snippet: The Walmart-Jet deal poses the question of whether Amazon is stoppable. Also, why hiring people who aren’t 20-something Stanford bros can be helpful.

docs.snippet: A court in Brazil has been seeking information from the messaging service to help in an organized crime and drug trafficking investigation.

headline.print_headline: Judge Shuts Down WhatsApp in Brazil
headline.main: WhatsApp Blocked in Brazil as Judge Seeks Data

docs.abstract: Brazilian judge orders Facebook's messaging service WhatsApp to be suspended for 72 hours nationwide after court order is filed seeking user data from service to aid in criminal investigation.
